newsitem.title: USA: MYR Group Q1 revs boosted by storm work.
newsitem.headline: MYR Group Q1 revs boosted by storm work.

text.p: MYR Group Inc said Monday first quarter storm work and business in the commercial-industrial sector boosted first-quarter revenues.
"First quarter revenues were not held down by our normal winter slowdown," MYR chairman and chief executive Charles Brennan said in a statement.
He said, however, higher expenses were posted for winter fleet maintenance and unemployment taxes.
MYR reported net earnings of $0.20 a share versus $0.05 a share last year.
"Based on our current backlog and level of business activity, management expects revenues and net income to post nice gains over prior year results for 1997," Brennan said.
MYR also said it completed its acquisition of D.W. Close Co Inc, an electrical contracting firm with annual revenues of about $25 million to $30 million. Terms of the transaction were not disclosed.
